title: Time to plate 1.00 mol Ni with 1.00 A of current

content.prompt:
An electric current of 1.00 ampere is passed through an aqueous solution of Ni(NO3)2. How long will it take to plate out exactly 1.00 mol of nickel metal, assuming 100 percent current efficiency?

(1 faraday = 96,500 coulombs = 6.02 X 1023 electrons)

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
